relevant_findings.general: Reclining in bed in no acute distress
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, normal S1 & S2 without murmurs/rubs/gallops
relevant_findings.pulmonary: Clear to auscultation bilaterally with no wheezing/crackles/ronchi
relevant_findings.abdominal: Obese, non-distended abdomen with midline laparotomy scar; normoactive bowel sounds present; soft but tender throughout (especially on sides)
relevant_findings.extremities: Warm, well-perfused with no edema or cyanosis; pedal pulses palpable
relevant_findings.neurological: Alert and oriented to person, place, and time; cranial nerves II-XII grossly intact
